::Fliq::

Fliq stops, setting Strafe down on the ground for a short rest. That 
Decepticon was heavy as the pit. After sitting down for a few minutes 
Fliq gets up again, setting Strafe on his back and carrying the bot 
off toward the CF.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Forget Fliq's hand being near his gun in my last post, I forgot 
he's 
> in beast mode.
> 
> ::Fliq::
> 
> Turning toward where his scanners reported that a bot was 
functional, 
> Fliq takes a few steps forward. He looks ahead of him, seeing a 
large 
> bot laying on the ground, in stasis lock. Fliq walks up to the bot, 
> noting that he was Decepticon.
> 
> "Lets get you to a CR," he says, knowing the Decepticon probably 
> wouldn't hear him, and slings Strafe onto his back with alot of 
> difficulty. The large fox takes off back toward the CF, sending a 
> transmission to Iron Raptor.
> 
> "Commander," the transmission read, "There's quite a large wreck at 
my 
> position. You might want to send a few bots to salvage this place."
